name.description: must be a string and is required

image.description: must be a string and is required

card.description: can only be one of the enum values and is required

situation.description: can only be one of the enum values and is required

secondarySituation.description: can only be one of the enum values and is required

cost.description: the cost for using the ability

type.description: can only be one of the enum values and is required

value.description: must be an int or string and is required

attribute.description: can only be one of the enum values and is required

bonus.description: how many extra rolls/re-rolls result from this ability or how much to heal. (Re-roll only) 0 indicates up to N dice originally rolled

uniqueBonus.description: for bonuses that don't just add to the attribute

type.description: additive is for adding to a result. duplicate is for duplicating successes that are a certain value.

oncePerRound.description: is the item used once per round?

disposable.description: is this item used only once and then disposed?

test.description: must be an array and is required
